package.name: marketplace-lang-ext-incomplete
package.title: Nuxeo Platform Additional Languages
package.description: The Nuxeo Platform Additional Languages addon provides languages that were not sufficiently translated (95%) to be included in the default distribution of the Nuxeo Platform. More information about how to translate the Nuxeo Platform at https://doc.nuxeo.com/nxdoc/how-to-translate-the-nuxeo-platform/.
